an8.77:1.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.77:1.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
an8.77:2.3: Idhāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:2.5: Tassa uṭṭhahato, ghaṭato, vāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:2.6: So tena alābhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an8.77:2.7: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati, ghaṭati, vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, socī ca paridevī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:3.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:3.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato ghaṭato vāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:3.4: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.
an8.77:3.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, madī ca pamādī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:4.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:4.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.77:4.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:4.4: So tena alābhena socati kilamati paridevati, urattāḷiṁ kandati, sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an8.77:4.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, socī ca paridevī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:5.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:5.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.77:5.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:5.4: So tena lābhena majjati pamajjati pamādamāpajjati.
an8.77:5.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati na ghaṭati na vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, madī ca pamādī ca, cuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:6.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:6.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato, ghaṭato, vāyamato lābhāya, lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:6.4: So tena alābhena na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an8.77:6.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati ghaṭati vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, na ca socī na ca paridevī, accuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:7.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:7.3: Tassa uṭṭhahato, ghaṭato, vāyamato lābhāya, lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:7.4: So tena lābhena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādamāpajjati.
an8.77:7.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, uṭṭhahati, ghaṭati, vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, na ca madī na ca pamādī, accuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:8.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:8.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.77:8.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya, lābho nuppajjati.
an8.77:8.4: So tena alābhena na socati na kilamati na paridevati, na urattāḷiṁ kandati, na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
an8.77:8.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya, na ca lābhī, na ca socī na ca paridevī, accuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:9.1: Idha panāvuso, bhikkhuno pavivittassa viharato nirāyattavuttino icchā uppajjati lābhāya.
an8.77:9.2: So na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya.
an8.77:9.3: Tassa anuṭṭhahato, aghaṭato, avāyamato lābhāya, lābho uppajjati.
an8.77:9.4: So tena lābhena na majjati na pamajjati na pamādamāpajjati.
an8.77:9.5: Ayaṁ vuccatāvuso, ‘bhikkhu iccho viharati lābhāya, na uṭṭhahati, na ghaṭati, na vāyamati lābhāya, lābhī ca, na ca madī na ca pamādī, accuto ca saddhammā’.
an8.77:9.6: Ime kho, āvuso, aṭṭha puggalā santo saṁvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
